text:
There is a race condition in org/apache/jasper/util/SimplePool.java which
causes errors to occur when tomcat is under load.  All the details and a
patch can be found in bug report 728, which is the same bug for tomcat 3.2.*.
creator: lindsay@roguewave.com

text:
Thanks for the patch. It has been applied to Tomcat 4.0.

Marked as fixed in Tomcat 3.2.2 and Tomcat 3.3. See Bugzilla #728 for more 
information.
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
